title: fexkomin
author: fexkomin
created_time: June 27, 2023, 09:02:01 PMLast edit: July 01, 2023, 02:25:16 PM by fexkomin

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: I'd like to ask since you are offering themes of popular software how about support in installing and updating themes in the store, if I am a regular guy who does not have knowledge about installing and I am interested in what you're offering how can I address issues from every software that are in the store, or what if buyers ask us to help in the installation.And how about this https://fexkomin.xyz/hire-us/QuoteNeed Assistance With Your Project ?We can add new features to your websites. We support:Custom themes prepared with HTML & CSS.Solving problems that occur on your websitesNew features that can be added to your websitesSuggestions and experiences that can improve your businessÂ What We Work With:Custom PHP ScriptsCustom HTML WebsitesAdlinkflyVie Faucet ScriptClaimbits ScriptWordPressSo if I am a regular guy, does this mean I have to take this down, how about returning customers who want to buy another software and are aware of what you are offering does this mean I have to place a disclaimer that the buyer or a third party should do the installation since there is a new owner.I'd like to be enlightened.

comments.author: fexkomin
comments.body: Special orders(website design,custom works) are not within the $2000 I earn. I earned $2000 with just theme&script sales.Theme installation is a very simple process and there is a document. With the document, the user installs it himself. There are simple documents and video explanations. I have not had any problems so farIf you can use the internet, you won't have a problem

comments.author: noormcs5
comments.body: Quote from: fexkomin on June 27, 2023, 09:02:01 PMThe website has only hosting and domain expenses.I earned a total of $2000 and these earnings are sales made through the website and forums.Price: 2300$Since you are making money from this site by selling the products, why are you selling this site ?Secondly, can you share what are the traffic stats on this site and how many impressions you get on the site? Since your site is not AdSense enabled, there will only be earning from the sales and not from the ads?

Since your site is not AdSense enabled, there will only be earning from the sales and not from the ads?HiI'm moving abroad and I need money.https://ibb.co/64kQ1cH50+ daily visitors with Google searches and visitors from forums.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: fexkomin on June 28, 2023, 05:50:03 PMHiI'm moving abroad and I need money.https://ibb.co/64kQ1cH50+ daily visitors with Google searches and visitors from forums.Do you want to say that you made a profit of $2000 with a total of 6.7k visits? For example, in 26 days in June, only 12 clicks and 77 impressions? At the same time, you are selling templates/scripts worth $15... Honestly, this seems so surreal to me that I find it hard to believe.

comments.author: fexkomin
comments.body: With the right targeting, 6-7k visitors is not less.And the prices of the products have just been lowered. it wasn't $15
